title: Convert.App
description:
Convert anything with Convert.App! Files, Units, Currencies and others.  With 100% privacy without sending us your data. For this, we intensively use and compile web technologies such as Canvas API, File API, various open source JS libraries and WebAssembly. In this way, you can use our tools safely at work, at school, in government institutions or at home. In tools that technically need to send data to the server, we indicate this to you with labels.
